task: Select the table, the selector weight should be 110.
Select the apple in the last plate (The selector weight should be 40).
explanation: .game-board__desk - weight 10 (class Selector), .game-board__plate - weight 10 (class Selector). :last-child - weight 10 (pseudo class :last-child), .game-board__apple - weight 10 (class Selector) .Total: 40

task: Select every 2nd peach in all plates regardless of the number of plates.
Select all tomatoes except the one in the 2nd plate. The selector specificity should be 50.
explanation: .game-board__desk - weight 10 (class Selector) .game-board__plate - weight 10 (class Selector). :not(:nth-of-type(2)) - weight 20 (Pseudo-class :not with nested pseudo-class :nth-of-type) .game-board__tomato - weight 10 (class Selector) .Total: 50
